The following purchase order number should appear in all related correspondences:

To:

Ms. {{ doc.supplier_name }}

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "location") }}

{%- if frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "telephone_and_fax") -%}

Tel/Fax: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Supplier", doc.supplier_name, "telephone_and_fax") }}

{%- endif -%}

Ship To:
{{ frappe.db.get_value("Branch", doc.deliver_to, "address") }}
{%- endif -%}

Dear Sir/Madam,


{%- if doc.header -%} {{ doc.header }} {%- endif -%}
{% set ns = namespace(count=1)%} {% for group in doc.items | groupby('item_code') %} {% for group2 in group.list | groupby('rate') %} {% set ns.count = ns.count + 1 %} {% endfor %} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.freight_insurance_charges -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.royalty -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.tax -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.other_charges -%} {%- endif -%}
Sl. No Code Name Unit Qty Rate Amount
{{ns.count}} {{ group.list[0].item_code }} {{ group.list[0].item_name }} {{ group2.list[0].description }} {%- if group2.list[0].notes -%}
Specs {{ group2.list[0].notes }} {%- endif -%}
{%- if group.list[0].brand_name -%} {{ group.list[0].brand_name }}, {{ group.list[0].model_name}} {%- endif -%} 		{{ group.list[0].uom }} {{ group2.list | sum(attribute='qty') }} {{ group2.list[0].rate }} {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(group2.list | sum(attribute='amount')) }}
Discount {{ frappe.format_value(doc.discount * -1, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Freight and Insurance Charges {{ frappe.format_value(doc.freight_insurance_charges, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Royalty {{ frappe.format_value(doc.royalty, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Taxes {{ frappe.format_value(doc.tax, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Other Charges {{ frappe.format_value(doc.other_charges, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Total {{ frappe.format_value(doc.grand_total, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
In Words: {{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.grand_total, doc.currency))}}
{%- if doc.terms -%}

Purchase Terms & Conditions:

{{ doc.terms }} {%- endif -%}
